features: Caldrea Sea Salt Neroli Fabric Softener is HE machine-compatible and helps release wrinkles to make ironing easier
Softens and freshens laundry while eliminating pesky static
Featured blend of essential oils work magic to refresh, condition, and liven up laundry
Use 1/2 capful in the rinse cycle of your laundry load for softening, static removal, and wrinkle release
Made without Phthalates, Formaldehyde, Artificial Colors, Parabens, and Animal-Derived Ingredients
body.description: Caldrea Sea Salt Neroli Fabric Softener refreshes fabric while releasing wrinkles and getting rid of static. Its plant-derived, cruelty free fabric conditioning elements keep clothes soft, and its formula is HE-machine compatible. Our essential oil blend, featuring Lemon, Neroli, Cardamom and Juniper, leaves your soft laundry with a fresh, clean scent.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This seashore scent blends notes of citrus and juniper with fragrant breezes of minerals and florals. The natural, sun-kissed scent of a day at the coast. From the first smell to the last, you'll want to stay for more. Made with complex essential oils to create an intricate, harmonious fragrance.

Caldrea Sea Salt Neroli Hand Soap 10.8 oz Caldrea Sea Salt Neroli Hand Lotion 10.8 oz Caldrea Sea Salt Neroli Multi-Surface Countertop Spray 16 oz Caldrea Sea Salt Neroli Dish Soap, 16 oz Caldrea Sea Salt Neroli Linen & Room Spray 16 oz Caldrea Sea Salt Neroli Scented Candle 8.1 oz Description With Caldrea Sea Salt Neroli Hand Soap, hands are soft, clean, and fragrant. A blend of Aloe Vera Gel, Olive Oil, and essential oils cleanses and conditions. Caldrea Sea Salt Neroli Hand Lotion makes hands soft and smooth with essential oils. This light formula is ideal for frequent application throughout the day. Caldrea Sea Salt Neroli Countertop Spray refreshes home and mind. Safe and hardworking, this cleaner uses a special vegetable protein extract to quickly remove odors. Caldrea Dish Soap makes washing dishes a luxury experience. Made with essential oils and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients for a delightful clean. Freshen the room with Caldrea Sea Salt Neroli Linen and Room Spray. Mist laundry, or wake up sheets, pillows and blankets. This safe and versatile essential oil air freshener creates a signature scent. Caldrea Sea Salt Neroli Scented Candle has an intricate, harmonious fragrance. With a 45 hour burn time, you'll enjoy a long lasting fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best softener ever
reviews.reviewText: So the scent is really pleasant, but it doesn't really go in to or last on the clothes. However, the clothes and sheets and towels are very very soft. My family told me I needed to keep getting this kind of softener because its the only brand we have had that you can actually tell something is happening softness wise.It's kind of expensive, but it really works. I'm a convert now because I feel like the store brands don't do anything compared to this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Fabric Softener
reviews.reviewText: First time trying this fabric softener and I love it! Water here is very hard and without a fabric softener (that is of a more organic nature, in keeping with our natural/organic lifestyle), my sensitive skin really suffers terrible itchiness when wearing any of my washed items. This softener has remedied that, while also being far less chemical than its counterparts like Downy and such, no synthetic scent either, and truly keeps my fabrics soft - my skin is thankful! The cost is a tad high, though we're accustomed to 'organic' or natural products costing more (unfortunately)...we'd prefer it were less, but overall don't mind the extra cost when considering our experience with the product. Thus far I've tried the Neroli/Sea Salt and like it a lot. Just ordered Ginger/Pomelo to see how I like its scent. Will continue using Caldrea, for sure!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely adore this fabric softener in so many ways! The scent is delightful, and what’s even better is that it lingers, keeping my laundry smelling fresh for a long time. The fact that it’s organic is a big plus for me, knowing that it’s a more natural choice.My only reservation is the price. It’s a bit on the expensive side compared to other options on the market. However, for those who prioritize organic and long-lasting freshness, it might be worth the investment.Overall, it’s a fantastic product that I genuinely enjoy using, but the cost does give me pause. 🌿🌸👚 #FreshLaundry #OrganicChoice #ScentSensation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and smells good
reviews.reviewText: If you're reading all the comments about how good this smells and you're worrying that you're going to smell like a flower shop when you wear your clothes don't. Unless I stick my nose to my shirt I can't smell anything. If I do, yes, it smells pretty good (but faintly).My shirts are much software now. We'll see how it manages static once the temperatures start to drop but I imagine it'll do fine.Overall I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve only used once so far and does not seem to be too bad. I wish the scent was a little strong but love the fact it’s a little more natural

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this because my favorite scent is often outbids rock. This a nice change because is it fresh and not overwhelming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Came back to buy again !
reviews.reviewText: I’m in love with this scent !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The smell is not terrible but it's thick and odd and doesn't leave a smell behind. I guess it softens, I didn't notice it as much as the lack of smell before and after drying.
I have been using Caldrea softeners for a long time. Love everything about this product- scent is not overwhelming, softness of the clothes after washing, just love it
Love, love the smell. Clothes are soft. It is pricey and wish the scent would last longer, but I still love it.
I use this for bedding. It smells so good, very fresh and lightly floral. I dont know if it makes things particularly soft but the smell is lovely
The scent is incredible, but doesn’t really stick to the fabric

reviews.reviewTitle: Very expensive and I don't know that it is "worth it" but...
reviews.reviewText: It smells amazing and makes me feel like a millionaire! I just use this on my bed sheets. Just a little treat to make me feel way fancier than I actually am.
